headline: Nucor: Well-Positioned Due To Tariffs, But Heavily Reliant On External Suppliers
summary: Nucor thrives with U.S. steel tariffs and efficient production, but faces recession risks. Read why NUE is rated hold and why investments in iron ore royalty companies makes sense.
